author: rederpj
msg: Update CHANGES file to include the prefork idle child cleanup fix.

author: rederpj
msg: Changes required to make prefork clean up idle children properly. There was a window during which a starting worker deadlocks when an idle cleanup arrives before it completes init. Apache then keeps trying to cleanup the same deadlocked worker forever (until higher pids come along, but it still will never reduce below the deadlocked pid). Thus the number of children would not reduce to the correct idle level.

author: minfrin
msg: Bugfixes to proxy_ftp.c -> in some places uri_addr was used instead
of connect_addr - all hail cut and paste!
